StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalIncludeDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to add to the include path; separate with semi-colons if more than one. (-I[path]).

EnumProperty.Name: DebugInformationFormat
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the type of debugging information generated by the compiler.

BoolProperty.Name: TreatWarningAsError
BoolProperty.Description: Treats all compiler warnings as errors.

IntProperty.Name: ErrorLimit
IntProperty.Description: Set the maximum number of errors to emit before stopping. A value of zero disables the error limit. The default value is 20.

IntProperty.Name: TemplateBacktraceLimit
IntProperty.Description: Set the maximum number of entries to print in a template instantiation backtrace. A value of zero disables the limit. The default value is 10.

BoolProperty.Name: OmitFramePointers
BoolProperty.Description: Suppresses creation of frame pointers on the call stack.

StringListProperty.Name: PreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more preprocessor defines to be enabled for the compilation.

StringListProperty.Name: UndefinePreprocessorDefinitions
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more preprocessor undefines.

BoolProperty.Name: UndefineAllPreprocessorDefinitions
BoolProperty.Description: Undefine all previously defined preprocessor values.

EnumProperty.Name: ExceptionHandling
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the model of exception handling to be used by the compiler.

BoolProperty.Name: FunctionLevelLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Place each function in its own section.

BoolProperty.Name: DataLevelLinking
BoolProperty.Description: Place each data in its own section.

BoolProperty.Name: BufferSecurityCheck
BoolProperty.Description: Enable protection against stack-based memory corruption errors.

BoolProperty.Name: PositionIndependentCode
BoolProperty.Description: Generate Position Independent Code (PIC) for use in a shared library.

BoolProperty.Name: UseShortEnums
BoolProperty.Description: Enum type uses only as many bytes required by input set of possible values.

BoolProperty.Name: RuntimeTypeInfo
BoolProperty.Description: Adds code for checking C++ object types at run time (runtime type information).

EnumValue.Name: gnuc99
EnumValue.Description: C99 Language Standard with GNU extensions.

EnumValue.Name: gnuc11
EnumValue.Description: C11 Language Standard with GNU extensions.

EnumValue.Name: gnucpp98
EnumValue.Description: C++98 Language Standard with GNU extensions.

EnumValue.Name: gnucpp11
EnumValue.Description: C++11 Language Standard with GNU extensions.

EnumProperty.Name: LanguageExtensions
EnumProperty.Description: Enable support for clang-specific C/C++ language extensions.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableMicrosoftExtensions
BoolProperty.Description: Enable support for extensions from Microsoft Visual C++.

EnumProperty.Name: MscVersion
EnumProperty.Description: Version of the Microsoft C/C++ compiler to report in _MSC_VER.

IntProperty.Name: ConstExprLimit
IntProperty.Description: Sets the limit for recursive constexpr function invocations. The default value is 512.

IntProperty.Name: TemplateRecursionLimit
IntProperty.Description: Sets the limit for recursively nested template instantiations. The default value is 1024.

BoolProperty.Name: PreserveTempFiles
BoolProperty.Description: If set, the intermediate compilation results are stored to files. Look for files with suffixes .ii, .s and .o.

EnumProperty.Name: CompileAs
EnumProperty.Description: Select compile language option for .c and .cpp files. 'Default' will detect based on a .c or extenstion.

StringListProperty.Name: ForcedIncludeFiles
StringListProperty.Description: One or more forced include files.

BoolProperty.Name: ShowIncludes
BoolProperty.Description: Generates a list of include files with compiler output.

StringListProperty.Name: EnableSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be enabled.

StringListProperty.Name: DisableSpecificWarnings
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be suppressed.

StringListProperty.Name: TreatSpecificWarningsAsErrors
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to be treated as errors.

StringListProperty.Name: TreatSpecificWarningsNotAsErrors
StringListProperty.Description: Specify one or more warnings to not be treated as errors.

BoolProperty.Name: EchoCommandLines
BoolProperty.Description: Print out the commands clang is invoked with during compilation.

BoolProperty.Name: RunStaticAnalysis
BoolProperty.Description: Run the clang static analyzer for all source files.
